files.description: Package initializer exposing the public API for benchmark contract generation, validation, and compliance reporting.
Defines the contract data model and JSON schema for required metadata, reference algorithm/pseudocode, output invariants, tolerance policy, and canonical test vectors.
Parses and rewrites benchmarks_v0_1.md to insert or update a standardized 'Contract' section for each v0.1 benchmark idempotently.
Implements contract generation defaults, normalization rules, and helpers to build canonical contract blocks for each benchmark.
Runs contributed benchmark implementations against the canonical test vectors and produces a pass/fail + diagnostics compliance report per contract.
Provides structured diagnostics (diffs, tolerance mismatches, invariant violations) and utilities to serialize compliance results as JSON and human-readable text.
Command-line interface to (1) add/update contract sections in the v0.1 benchmark markdown and (2) validate implementation compliance and emit reports.
Entry point enabling 'python -m cosmo_contracts' to invoke the CLI for contract injection and compliance checking.
End-to-end tests ensuring contract sections are inserted/updated deterministically in benchmark markdown and include all required subsections.
Tests the compliance runner on stub implementations to verify pass/fail decisions, tolerance behavior, invariant checks, and diagnostic output stability.
Documentation specifying the v0.1 benchmark Contract section format, required fields, tolerance policy semantics, canonical test vector rules, and reporting requirements for contributors.
Default contract templates and per-benchmark overrides (metadata keys, invariants, tolerances, and canonical vectors) used to generate standardized Contract sections.

missionDescription: For each v0.1 benchmark, add a contract section: required metadata, reference algorithm/pseudocode, output invariants, tolerance policy, and a canonical test vector; require that every contributed implementation reports contract compliance (pass/fail + diagnostics).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Upgrades benchmarks from a checklist to enforceable, interoperable artifacts. 'Benchmark contracts' make cross-program comparisons meaningful by pinning down required inputs, algorithmic steps, accept...
